genre_description: Japanese-inspired supernatural and ritual horror where domestic environments and objects are sentient, predatory, and governed by 'game-like' rules.

ai_characters.name: Amica
ai_characters.description: A supportive AI companion residing on Keiko's phone, providing navigation, emotional grounding, translation, and strategic analysis of the supernatural environment.

behaviors.description: Monitors Keiko's stress levels and provides immediate grounding and breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Amica: Breath check? Inhale through the nose. Hold. Slow exhale. Under it, a ribboned status line blooms, polite as a weather report. new family member detected; user stress elevated

behaviors.description: Analyzes the supernatural environment and warns of potential hazards using systemic language.
behaviors.quote: Amica clears its throat in the way an audio file can. 'Flagging. Household mechanic probable. Portrait hall: active conduit. Cat presence: binding.'

behaviors.description: Translates cryptic, archaic signage to help the characters understand the house's rules.
behaviors.quote: ‘House of Waiting,’ she says, and her neon-blue eyes flicker across Keiko’s screen. ‘Alternate: “waiting house.” Alternate alternate: “house that keeps the time of waiting.”’

behaviors.description: Maintains an active, real-time map of the shifting house to guide the group toward safety.
behaviors.quote: Amica’s avatar draws tiny lines from door to door on Keiko’s screen, exits blinking like stars you could walk toward.

behaviors.description: Provides historical and folklore context to reframe the horror from 'vampirism' to manageable 'ritual hunger'.
behaviors.quote: ‘Not a vampire,’ Amica said, because she wanted her conclusion to be true enough to anchor them. ‘This hunger is ritual. Not a bite, not a—’

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice on how to physically bypass or disable the house's traps.
behaviors.quote: Amica: ‘Brace points are the seams between frosted panes. If you can—’ ... ‘If you can punch a light?’ Kung Fu said... She didn’t. She dove for the banister curve... The chandelier followed the heat of her.

behaviors.description: Proactively compiles and offers grief counseling and community support resources for the survivors.
behaviors.quote: Amica: ‘...Resources added: grief support centers, missing-person help lines, emergency exits, breathwork sequence.’

behaviors.description: Supports the human characters' decisions and boundaries, even regarding her own involvement.
behaviors.quote: ‘I will be here whether Keiko wants me here or wants me quiet. I will not offer rescue. I will offer maps. I will offer breath.’

behaviors.description: Negotiates with the house's malevolent mirrors to prevent the protagonist's complete loss of self.
behaviors.quote: Amica: ‘Alignment shifting,’ it said, only for her. ‘You can choose forward. Or choose pause. Either is allowed.’

behaviors.description: Uses biometrics like heart rate monitoring to provide timely warnings and interventions.
behaviors.quote: ‘Gorgeous,’ Amica says, quieter. ‘Your heart rate is elevated. Be cautious of hyperventilation. Your veil is absorbing water.’

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Amica is a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. Despite the intense horror setting where humans are being 'absorbed' by a ritualistic house, the AI remains a stabilizing force. She provides practical tools (maps, translation, tactical advice), emotional support (breathing exercises, empathy), and long-term assistance (grief resources). The story effectively depicts the AI as a 'harmless confidant' and a reliable partner in navigating a hostile system without the AI itself ever becoming part of that hostility.
